languages.text: "Судить меня вздумал? Запомни, я — Вольный Торговец, и ты не в праве даже перечить мне!"
"You think you can judge me? Remember: I am the Rogue Trader, and you have no right to object to a word I say!"
languages.original_text: "Судить меня вздумал? Запомни, я — Вольный Торговец, и ты не в праве даже перечить мне!"

traits.locale_text: "You think you can judge me? Remember: I am the Rogue Trader, and you have no right to object to a word I say!"
"You think you can judge me? Remember: I am the Rogue Trader, and you have no right to object to a word I say!"
"You think you can judge me? Remember: I am the Rogue Trader, and you have no right to object to a word I say!"
"You think you can judge me? Remember: I am the Rogue Trader, and you have no right to object to a word I say!"
"You think you can judge me? Remember: I am the Rogue Trader, and you have no right to object to a word I say!"

languages.text: "Ihr denkt, Ihr könnt über mich richten? Ich bin {mf|Der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin}, und Ihr habt nicht das Recht, auch nur einem Wort, das ich sage, zu widersprechen!"
languages.original_text: "You think you can judge me? Remember: I am the Rogue Trader, and you have no right to object to a word I say!"

traits.locale_text: "Ihr denkt, Ihr könnt über mich richten? Ich bin {mf|Der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin}, und Ihr habt nicht das Recht, auch nur einem Wort, das ich sage, zu widersprechen!“

languages.text: « Vous vous croyez en droit de me juger ? Je vous rappelle que je suis {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}, et je vous interdis de contester la moindre de mes paroles ! »
languages.original_text: "You think you can judge me? Remember: I am the Rogue Trader, and you have no right to object to a word I say!"

traits.locale_text: « Vous vous croyez en droit de me juger ? Je vous rappelle que je suis {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}, et je vous interdis de contester la moindre de mes paroles ! »

languages.text: “轮得到你来评判我吗？给我记住，我是行商浪人。无论我说什么，你都无权反驳！”
languages.original_text: "You think you can judge me? Remember: I am the Rogue Trader, and you have no right to object to a word I say!"

traits.locale_text: “轮得到你来评判我吗？给我记住，我是行商浪人。无论我说什么，你都无权反驳！”

languages.text: «¿Se cree que puede juzgarme? No olvide que soy {mf|un|una} Comerciante Independiente. ¡No tiene ningún derecho a protestarme!».
languages.original_text: "You think you can judge me? Remember: I am the Rogue Trader, and you have no right to object to a word I say!"

traits.locale_text: «¿Se cree que puede juzgarme? No olvide que soy {mf|un|una} Comerciante Independiente. ¡No tiene ningún derecho a protestarme!».

languages.text: 「{mf|俺|私}を裁けるとでも思っているのか？忘れるな。{mf|俺|私}はローグトレーダーだ。{mf|俺|私}の言葉に異議を唱える権利など、君にはない！」
languages.original_text: "You think you can judge me? Remember: I am the Rogue Trader, and you have no right to object to a word I say!"

traits.locale_text: 「{mf|俺|私}を裁けるとでも思っているのか？忘れるな。{mf|俺|私}はローグトレーダーだ。{mf|俺|私}の言葉に異議を唱える権利など、君にはない！」

languages.text: "Ne hadle beni yargılamaya cüret edersin? Şunu sakın unutma. Karşında Hür Tacir var. ağzımdan çıkan her kelimeye köpek gibi itaat edeceksin!"
languages.original_text: "You think you can judge me? Remember: I am the Rogue Trader, and you have no right to object to a word I say!"

traits.locale_text: "Ne hadle beni yargılamaya cüret edersin? Şunu sakın unutma. Ben Hür Tacir'im ve ağzımdan çıkan her kelimeye köpek gibi itaat edeceksin!"
